effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.

short_effect.black_white: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.

flavor_text.black_white: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack’s damage increases.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack’s damage increases.
